room_title: Escape room "Observation" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My best friend and I tried this today, it was our first time doing an escape room. We did the Crime Scene room, and absolutely loved it! We'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Observation" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a blast! Did the Crime Scene room and escaped with a little over a minute to spare. Good times!

room_title: Escape room "Observation" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had so much fun! Did Zero dark 30 room and then the who done it murder room. Had a party of 8 - split adults against kids (all teenagers) and the adults won! Such fun!

room_title: Escape room "Observation" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Ton of fun. Perfect challenge. Did the one hour and the 30 min challenge room for a bachelor party.

room_title: Escape room "Observation" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My two kids (12 & 14) and I had a blast at the Lewisville location! We did the 30-minute murder mystery and worked together as a team to find the clues and unlock the locks. I highly recommend this adventure with your family!
